system.novice:
Navigator makes Oposed Willpower Test vs single target in range, if winning inflicts 1d5 Corruption Points on Target (Warded Armour Protects), if failing Navigator gains 1 Insanity Point. Non-living, Untouchable, or Daemonic/Warp targets are immune. Forewarned/Unaware targets have +30 on Roll to resist. 
Note: This power is seen as vile, generally only seen used by those of Shrouded or Renegade Houses.
system.adept: Target Suffers 1d10 Corruption Points instead of 1d5. But if failing Navigator suffers 1d5 Insanity Points.
system.master: Instead of causing corruption points, target immediately makes Malignancy Test. But if failing Opposed Test Navigator suffers 1d10 Insanity Points

description.value:
Novice: Navigator makes Oposed Willpower Test vs single target in range, if winning inflicts 1d5 Corruption Points on Target (Warded Armour Protects), if failing Navigator gains 1 Insanity Point. Non-living, Untouchable, or Daemonic/Warp targets are immune. Forewarned/Unaware targets have +30 on Roll to resist. Note: This power is seen as vile, generally only seen used by those of Shrouded or Renegade Houses.

Adept: Target Suffers 1d10 Corruption Points instead of 1d5. But if failing Navigator suffers 1d5 Insanity Points.

Master: Instead of causing corruption points, target immediately makes Malignancy Test. But if failing Opposed Test Navigator suffers 1d10 Insanity Points
